Binary: libstarpu-dev, libstarpu-1.4-8, libstarpu-openmp-llvm-1.4-1t64, libstarpufft-1.4-1t64, libstarpumpi-1.4-3t64, starpu-tools, starpu-examples, libsocl-1.4-1t64, libstarpurm-1.4-1t64
